nodes.text: The Siroma was a Republic Sienar Systems Marauder-class corvette in the Kathol Republic Navy.

In 8 ABY, the Siroma responded to a distress call from the Bravado III, alongside her sister ships Juno II, Mirandine, Quillion, Solidarity, and Triumph. Together, they intercepted the modified New Republic corvette FarStar and impounded it on Dayark.
